item.title: Dodian command help-- just placing them
item.dc:creator: @Zelda_Knight Zelda Knight
item.description:
@Zelda_Knight wrote:

Ok good.

Now remove:

 c.savemoreinfo();

The reason for removing this is because in dodian/devolution 7.0 there are no moreinfo files.
Compile & Run.

Glad to help.

Read full topic

now theres that 1 lol.

item.source: Dodian command help-- just placing them

item.title: Dodian command help-- just placing them
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:21, topic:225071”]that 1 would just go where i have other commands to tele and give xp… etc…

grr now i got

[code]client.java:3890: ‘)’ expected
} else if ((playerRights > 2) && (command.startsWith(“giveadmi
n”) {

^
client.java:3891: not a statement
String name = command.substring(10);
^
client.java:3891: ‘;’ expected
String name = command.substring(10);
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
that turned in to this…

^ 1 error prease any key to continue . . .[/quote]It quite explains itself:

Your compiler told you:

client.java:3890: ')' expected

So now you know you will have to add a ).

Now it also tells you WHERE:
client.java, at line 3890.

Now open up your client.java and press CTRL + G and enter 3890.

This will bring you to line 3890.

And for now, I’ll make it easy on you:

} else if ((playerRights > 2) && (command.startsWith("giveadmi n")) { That’s the correct code. Notice the second ) at the end.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Zelda_Knight wrote:

sigh

search:

public void customCommand(String command) {

Add commands under:

actionAmount++;

Do you guys even know what your saying is gonna work before you tell him?
lawl.

Do that, Then tell me when it has worked. lol.

Edit: If you have errors bout brackets, read them, then fix what it says…
If it says bracket expected then you need to add one somewhere?

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian command help-- just placing them
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

yes…

[code]
}

	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ballin")) {
		emotes = 1;
		pEmote = 0x30;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 2) {
		String name = command.substring(10);
	try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.playerRights = 2;
		c.savemoreinfo();
		c.savechar();
		c.disconnected = true;
		sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator");
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
	}[/code]

added it rite under ballin

Read full topic
